cetus.hir
Class IRTools

java.lang.Object
  cetus.hir.IRTools

public final class IRTools
extends java.lang.Object

IRTools provides tools that perform search/replace in the IR tree.

                                         Expression e)
Searches the IR tree beginning at t for the Expression e.

Parameters:

e - the expression to be searched for.
Returns:
true if t contains e and false otherwise.

Returns:

                                        Expression e)
Finds the first instance of the Expression e in the IR tree t.

e - the expression to be searched for.
Returns:

Returns:

checkConsistency

public static boolean checkConsistency(Traversable t)
Checks the consistency of the IR subtree rooted at t. It checks if every children of a parent node has a correct back link to the parent node.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be checked.
Returns:
true if it is consistent, false otherwise.

replaceAll

public static void replaceAll(Traversable t,
                              Expression x,
                              Expression y)
Replaces all instances of expression x on the IR tree beneath t by clones of expression y. Skips the immediate right hand side of member access expressions.

Parameters:
t - The location at which to start the search.
x - The expression to be replaced.
y - The expression to substitute.

t - the traversable object to be searched from.
Returns:
the procedure that contains t.

replaceSymbol

public static Expression replaceSymbol(Expression e,
                                       Symbol var,
                                       Expression expr)
Replaces all occurrences of the specified variable var with the given expression expr in the input expression e. If the traversable object is the specified variable it returns a copy of the expression expr.

Parameters:
e - the input expression.
var - the variable to be replaced.
expr - the expression to be substituted.
Returns:
the cloned and modified expression.

replaceSymbolIn

public static void replaceSymbolIn(Traversable t,
                                   Symbol var,
                                   Expression e)
Replaces all occurrences of the specified variable var with the given expression e in the traversable object t in place.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be modified.
var - the variable to be replaced.
e - the expression to be substituted.

containsSymbol

public static boolean containsSymbol(Traversable t,
                                     Symbol var)
Checks if the specified traversable object contains any identifier derived from the given symbol var. This method only searches for the derived identifier not the symbol itself.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be searched.
var - the symbol to be searched for.
Returns:
true if there is any identifier derived from var, false otherwise.

containsSymbols

public static boolean containsSymbols(Traversable t,
                                      java.util.Set<Symbol> vars)
Checks if the specified traversable object contains any identifier derived from the given set of symbols vars. This method only searches for the derived identifier not the symbol itself.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be searched.
vars - the set of symbols to be searched for.
Returns:
true if there is any identifier derived from any symbol in vars, false otherwise.

containsSymbols

public static boolean containsSymbols(java.util.Set<Symbol> vars,
                                      java.util.Set<Symbol> symbols)
Simple check method for existence of intersection between the two given sets of symbols.

Parameters:
vars - the first set of symbols.
symbols - the second set of symbols.
Returns:
true if the intersection is not empty, false otherwise.

Parameters:

type - the IR type being searched for.

isAncestorOf

public static boolean isAncestorOf(Traversable anc,
                                   Traversable des)
Checks if the specified traversable object anc is an ancestor of the other traversable object des in the IR tree.

Parameters:
anc - a possible ancestor of des.
des - a possible descendant of anc.
Returns:
true if anc is an ancestor of des, false otherwise.

isDescendantOf

public static boolean isDescendantOf(Traversable des,
                                     Traversable anc)
Checks if the specified traversable object des is a descendant of the other traversable object anc in the IR tree.

Parameters:
des - a possible descendant of anc.
anc - a possible ancestor of des.
Returns:
true if des is a descendant of anc, false otherwise.

public static boolean containsFunctionCall(Traversable t)
Returns true if there is a FunctionCall within the traversable.

Parameters:
t - traversable object to be searched.
Returns:
true if t contains a function call.

getFunctionCalls

public static java.util.List<FunctionCall> getFunctionCalls(Traversable t)
Returns a list of FunctionCall expressions within the traversable object.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be searched.
Returns:
the list of function calls that appear in t.

collectPragmas

public static <T extends PragmaAnnotation> java.util.List<T> collectPragmas(Traversable t,
                                                                            java.lang.Class<T> pragma_cls,
                                                                            java.lang.String key)
Returns a list of pragma annotations that contain the specified string keys and are attached to annotatable objects within the traversable object t. For example, it can collect list of OpenMP pragmas having a work-sharing directive for within a specific procedure.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be searched.
pragma_cls - the type of pragmas to be searched for.
key - the keyword to be searched for.
Returns:
the list of matching pragma annotations.

getLastStatements

public static java.util.List<Statement> getLastStatements(Procedure proc)
Returns a list of the last Statements to be evaluated in the Procedure. This method actually searches for return statements or the last statement in traversal order if there is no return statement.

getStatementsOfType

public static <T extends Statement> java.util.List<T> getStatementsOfType(Traversable t,
                                                                          java.lang.Class<? extends Statement> type)
Returns a list of statements having the specified type in the given traversable object.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be examined.
type - the type of statements to be collected.
Returns:
the list of statements that are instances of type.

getExpressionsOfType

public static <T extends Expression> java.util.List<T> getExpressionsOfType(Traversable t,
                                                                            java.lang.Class<? extends Expression> type)
Returns a list of expressions having the specified type in the given traversable object.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be examined.
type - the type of expressions to be collected.
Returns:
the list of expressions that are instances of type.

getProcedureList

public static java.util.List<Procedure> getProcedureList(Program program)
Return a list of Procedures in a program.

removeAnnotations

public static void removeAnnotations(Traversable t,
                                     java.lang.Class<? extends Annotation> type)
Removes all annotations with the specified type from the given traversable object.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be searched.
type - the annotation types to be removed.

isIncluded

public static boolean isIncluded(Traversable t)
Checks if the specified traversable object is located within an included code section. This information could be useful when applying any transformation to a code section since any changes on the code within an included region is discarded when the header files are not expanded during printing.

Parameters:
t - the traversable object to be examined.
Returns:
true if t is part of the IR tree and within an included code section.
